translation: 伦巴第王德西德里乌斯
卡斯蒂利亚 费尔南多三世
耶路撒冷 伊莎贝拉二世
花剌子模 摩诃末二世

original: Your daughter [FromFrom.GetFirstName] comes to see you. She is very unhappy with the arranged marriage: '[Root.GetFatherMother] - I do not love my new husband and I will not accept this! I implore you to annul the marriage!'
translation: 你的女儿[FromFrom.GetFirstName]过来见你。她对你安排的婚姻非常不高兴：「[Root.GetFatherMother]，我不爱我的新丈夫，我不会接受这件事！所以我恳求您，取消这桩婚事吧！」

original: Very well, we shall not force you.

As the wedding celebrations are being prepared, [From.GetTitledName] informs you that [From.GetHerHis] daughter will not accept marrying [target_spurned_spouse.GetTitledName], and [From.GetSheHe] has decided to annul the marriage!
translation: 正当你筹备婚礼时，[From.GetTitledName]通知你[From.GetHerHis]女儿不接受与 [target_spurned_spouse.GetTitledName]结婚，[From.GetSheHe]已经决定取消这桩婚事了！

original: There is a rumor among the servants that the tragedy which befell the late husband of your daughter [From.GetFirstName] was in fact caused by her. She supposedly poisoned him in his sleep.
translation: 仆人们之间传言，降临在你女儿[From.GetFirstName]前夫身上的悲剧事实上是你女儿一手策划的。她可能在他熟睡时下了毒。

original: Who knows if such rumors are true?
translation: 谁知道这些传闻是不是真的？

original: You receive news that your daughter [From.GetFirstName], in a heated argument in the bedchamber, drew a sword and attacked and her spouse. He apparently managed to find a weapon to defend himself but she bested him in combat and killed him!
translation: 你收到消息称你的女儿，[From.GetFirstName]，在卧室里与她的丈夫发生了激烈的争吵。她拿起了一把剑攻击了她的配偶。她的丈夫试图拿起一把武器来保护自己，但是你的女儿在战斗中击败并杀死了他。
真可怕，但是……令人印象深刻！

original: Your daughter, [From.GetFirstName], has eloped! Worse, she seems to have made friends abroad and has settled in a castle in the realm of [From.Owner.TopLiege.PrimaryTitle.GetName]!
translation: 你的女儿，[From.GetFirstName]，和人私奔了！更糟糕的是，她投奔了她在外国的朋友并且在[From.Owner.TopLiege.PrimaryTitle.GetName]境内的一个城堡里定居下来。

original: Your daughter, [From.GetFirstName], has eloped, leaving her family and home behind! And you hardly believe your ears when you are told that she has banded up with scoundrels and criminals and formed a mercenary band, which she now leads!
translation: 你的女儿[From.GetFirstName]私奔了，完全把她的家族和家乡抛之脑后！最令你难以置信的是她还组织并领导了一个由流氓和罪犯组成的佣兵团！

original: Your daughter [From.GetFirstName] comes to see you: '[Root.GetFatherMotherCap], I cannot abide your arbitrariness and tyranny, and your hypocritical abuse of the name of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] vexes me more than anything else. I spit on your religion and I turn my back on it!'
translation: 你的女儿，[From.GetFirstName]，对你说：「[Root.GetFatherMotherCap]，我无法容忍你的专断和暴政。我最无法容忍的是你言不由衷地滥用[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]的名义。我唾弃你的信仰并且抛弃了它！」

original: I have raised a blasphemer and heretic!
translation: 我养大了一个异端的亵渎者！

original: Your daughter [From.GetFirstName] could not abide her solitary and ignoble existence as a prisoner. Ever prone to choosing her own path, this time she has chosen to take her own life.
translation: 你的女儿，[From.GetFirstName]，无法忍受作为一个孤独卑微的存在。她一直以来都想要为自己的人生道路做主却无法达成。这次她选择了自己想要的人生。

original: Your daughter [From.GetFirstName] comes to see you: '[Root.GetFatherMotherCap], [target_daughter_wants_to_marry.GetFirstName] and I love each other, and I demand you allow us to marry.'
translation: 你的女儿，[From.GetFirstName]，对你说：「[Root.GetFatherMotherCap]，我与[target_daughter_wants_to_marry.GetFirstName]相爱。我请求你允许我们结婚。」

original: Of course my dear, if that is what you desire.
Do not ask such absurd things of me.
translation: 别再问我如此荒谬的事情了。

original: Your [Root.GetMarshalName], [Root.job_marshal.GetTitledName], has come to you with a suggestion: 'My [Root.GetLordLady], it is my opinion that [recommended_for_marshal_ze_4000.GetTitledNameWithNick] would make an excellent military commander. I suggest we make use of [recommended_for_marshal_ze_4000.GetHerHis] talents for the good of the realm.
translation: 你的[Root.GetMarshalName]，[Root.job_marshal.GetTitledName]，向你提了一个建议：「[Root.GetLordLady]，我认为[recommended_for_marshal_ze_4000.GetTitledNameWithNick]有良好的军事素养。我建议您利用[recommended_for_marshal_ze_4000.GetHerHis]才干，任命其为新指挥官。」

original: No, I have other candidates in mind.
Someone or something has stirred up disloyal sentiments towards the ruler among the peasants of the realm
translation: 某些人或者事情引发了领地内农民对于统治者的不忠情绪

original: Refused to Preach Among the Pagans
translation: 拒绝在异教徒中进行传教活动

original: This character, while a [GetLordSpiritualName], refused to proselytize in Pagan realms, deeming it much too dangerous.
translation: 此角色，虽然身为[GetLordSpiritualName]，但是出于安全问题的考虑，拒绝在异教徒的领地中进行传教活动。

original: Your [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] approaches you with a request: 'My [Root.GetLordLady], I want your permission to travel to the Pagan lands and spread the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith among those unfortunate people. It shall be for the glory of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName].'
translation: 你的[Root.GetLordSpiritualName]找到你请求道：「我的[Root.GetLordLady]，我希望你允许我去异教徒的领地，向那些不幸的人们转播[Root.Religion.GetName]的信仰。一切都是为了[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]的荣耀。」

original: Your zeal does you credit. [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] be with you.
translation: 你的热情，应该受表扬。愿[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]与你同在。

original: No, I will not allow it.

My [Root.GetLordLady],

I would like us to invest in building a great temple for the glory of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]. I will contribute from my own purse to the construction costs.

Ever in service of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith,
[Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledName], [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]
translation:
我的[Root.GetLordLady]，

为了[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]的荣光，我希望我们可以投资建造一间大神殿。我会负担一部分建造费用。

[Root.Religion.GetName]的永恒的仆人，
[Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledName]，[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]的[Root.GetLordSpiritualName]

original: It would be a waste of money.
Strange news reach your ears. Apparently, one of your courtiers has converted to the [ze_5020_province.Religion.GetName] faith!
translation: 你听到了奇怪的传闻。看样子你的一个廷臣改信了[ze_5020_province.Religion.GetName]！

original: It seems another of your courtiers has converted to the [ze_5020_province.Religion.GetName] faith!
translation: 看起来你又有一个廷臣改信了[ze_5020_province.Religion.GetName]！

original: Something strange is going on here...

A number of incriminating letters have been found. They are from your [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] [Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledName], addressed to various members of your court, praising the simple virtues of the [Root.job_spiritual.Location.Religion.GetName]s and contrasting them with the tired, decadent ways of the [Root.Religion.GetName]s. This surely explains the recent outbreak of vile flirting with heathenry at your court!
translation: 你发现了一些寄往你宫廷成员们的信件，它们来自你的[Root.GetLordSpiritualName][Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledName]。这些信件赞美了[Root.job_spiritual.Location.Religion.GetName]信仰的纯粹，贬斥了[Root.Religion.GetName]相比之下的颓废。这很好地解释了近来异教信仰在你的宫廷里大量增加的情况！

original: If this madness stops now, I shall forgive.
translation: 如果他现在停止这疯狂的行为的话我会选择原谅他。

original: Your [Root.GetLordSpiritualName], [Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledNameWithNick], has been discovered charging money for various religious favors, putting the gold in [Root.job_spiritual.GetHerHis] own pocket.
translation: 你的[Root.GetLordSpiritualName]，[Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledNameWithNick]，被发现将各宗教人士的献金装进[Root.job_spiritual.GetHerHis]口袋。
令人失望，但是可以理解。

original:
My [Root.GetTitle],
I find life here among the heathens both wretched and dangerous, and I am convinced that they are both blind and deaf to the glory of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]. I plead with you to allow me to return home where I can do more useful work for the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith.

Your loyal servant,
[Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
我的[Root.GetTitle]，
我发现这里的生活因为异教徒的缘故既可怜又危险。而且我相信他们完全无视[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]的荣光。我请求你让我回家做一些对于[Root.Religion.GetName]更加有意义的事情。

你忠诚的从者，
[Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName]

original: The whining coward will be of no use there anyway.
translation: 这个只会抱怨的懦夫已经不再有用了。

original: Your [Root.GetMarshalName], [Root.job_marshal.GetTitledName], has put forward a plan for experimentation with new military technology, inspired by a supposedly brilliant inventor and engineer that [Root.job_marshal.GetSheHe] has recently befriended. All that is needed is a little funding...
translation: 你的[Root.GetMarshalName]，[Root.job_marshal.GetTitledName]，提出了新的军事技术研发计划，这个想法来源于[Root.job_marshal.GetSheHe]最近认识的一个所谓的天才发明家兼工程师。现在只差一些资金……

original: You receive a report from the outcome of the military experiments that your [Root.GetMarshalName] asked you to sponsor. Apparently, a large steel-plated chariot was constructed, propelled by ten men inside pulling it forward, directed by a commander peering out from a revolving turret mounted on top. This vehicle also had several ballistas firing through arrow slits. Though ending up being too slow (and expensive) for actual wartime employment, it still provided some valuable lessons.
translation: 你收到了关于你的[Root.GetMarshalName]要求下所进行的军事实验的报告。显然，一个内部有 10 个人来推动大型的钢镀战车造好了。指挥官可以从安装在战车顶部旋转炮塔窥视外面进行指挥。这部战车还有数个供弩箭使用的射击孔。虽然对于实战装备来说这种战车过于缓慢而且昂贵，但是这依然一次有用的经验。

original: You receive a report from the outcome of the military experiments that your [Root.GetMarshalName] asked you to sponsor. Apparently, a large steel-plated chariot was constructed, propelled by ten men inside pulling it forward, directed by a commander peering out from a revolving turret mounted on top. This vehicle also had several ballistas firing through arrow slits. Unfortunately, its weight caused a wooden bridge to collapse when crossing and the invention was lost in the river, also killing the engineer. The [Root.GetMarshalName] [Root.job_marshal.GetHerselfHimself] barely escaped with [Root.job_marshal.GetHerHis] life.
translation: 你收到了关于[Root.GetMarshalName]军事实验结果的报告。报告称，一个巨大的钢铁战车由十个人在里面推动，四周的还装射击孔，上面的旋转塔里有一名指挥官。不幸的是，由于战车过重，在经过一座木桥时发生崩塌。战车掉进了河里，而工程师也因此不幸身亡。而[Root.GetMarshalName][Root.job_marshal.GetHerselfHimself]及时地撤离挽救了[Root.job_marshal.GetHerHis]生命。

original: I'm glad something came out of the investment.
translation: 我很高兴投资有所收获。

original: You receive a report on the outcome of the military experiments that your [Root.GetMarshalName] asked you to sponsor. Apparently, a new kind of self-propelled arrow was tried out, based on Far Eastern models. Lit by fire, these arrows would scream and fly away leaving a trail of smoke and then explode on impact, killing several of the livestock used as practice targets. Though of dubious accuracy and prone to failure in rainy weather, these experiments have still provided some valuable lessons.
translation: 你收到了关于你的[Root.GetMarshalName]要求下所进行的军事实验的报告。显然，一种基于远东的模型的新型自推进式的箭被开发出来。这种箭点火之后会发出尖叫并且随着尾部的一道烟雾飞出。在收到冲击之后，箭会爆炸，杀死数个作为目标的牲畜。虽然飞行速度不稳定而且在雨天容易失灵，但是这依然一次有用的经验。

original: You receive a report on the outcome of the military experiments that your [Root.GetMarshalName] asked you to sponsor. Apparently, a new kind of self-propelled arrow was tried out, based on Far Eastern models. Lit by fire, these arrows would scream and fly away leaving a trail of smoke and then explode on impact, killing several of the livestock used as practice targets. Unfortunately, on the second trial, several of these missiles misfired, one striking the engineer dead and another nearly killing the [Root.GetMarshalName].
translation: 你收到了关于你的[Root.GetMarshalName]要求下所进行的军事实验的报告。显然，一种基于远东的模型的新型自推进式的箭被开发出来。这种箭点火之后会发出尖叫并且随着尾部的一道烟雾飞出。在收到冲击之后，箭会爆炸，杀死数个作为目标的牲畜。不幸的是，在第二次实验中，数个火箭失灵，其中有一个击杀了工程师，另一个杀死了在附近的[Root.GetMarshalName]。

original: You receive a report on the outcome of the military experiments that your [Root.GetMarshalName] asked you to sponsor. Apparently, the experiments consisted in training an large force of musicians to blow their trumpets in unison, thus deafening and stunning the enemy army in preparation for an attack. Attempts were also made to make castle walls tumble by marching around them blowing the trumpets.\n\nUnfortunately, while quite expensive, none of these experiments were successful.
translation: 你收到了关于你的[Root.GetMarshalName]要求下所进行的军事实验的报告。显然，这个实验包括训练一大批音乐家去齐声吹号角在作战准备时来震聋震晕敌人。实验中也尝试着用号角来震塌城堡的墙壁。\n\n不幸的是尽管花费高昂，整个实验都是失败的。

original: Trumpets? How much did I pay for this again...?
translation: 号角？我这次又要花多少钱……？

original: This character has suffered damage to [GetHerHis] eardrums, affecting [GetHerHis] ability to communicate with others.
translation: 这个角色的耳膜受过伤，影响了和别人交流的能力。

original: You receive a report on the outcome of the military experiments that your [Root.GetMarshalName] asked you to sponsor. Apparently, the experiments consisted in drenching a large amount of sheep in oil and setting fire to them, then sending the terrified, screaming animals towards the enemy. Unfortunately, it proved impossible to control the direction of the sheep. The engineer was immolated in a ball of fire and your [Root.GetMarshalName] barely escaped with [Root.GetHerHis] life.
translation: 你收到了关于[Root.GetMarshalName]军事实验结果的报告。报告称，试验主要是将大量的羊浇上油，然后朝羊群放火，将受到惊吓的羊群驱赶向敌人。不幸的是，他们无法控制羊群的方向，工程师被当场烧死。你的[Root.GetMarshalName]勉强保住了[Root.GetHerHis]命。

original: It seems we'll be dining roast mutton...
translation: 看来晚饭就要吃烤羊肉了……

original: You receive news of your [Root.GetMarshalName]'s activities in [Root.job_marshal.Location.GetName]. It appears [Root.job_marshal.GetSheHe] has been spreading ill words about your rule, encouraging disloyalty among the peasantry!
translation: 你收到报告称[Root.GetMarshalName]在[Root.job_marshal.Location.GetName]有异常活动。[Root.job_marshal.GetSheHe]一直在宣传你病危的消息，并鼓动农民叛乱！

original: Ill tidings, but I still need [Root.job_marshal.GetHerHim].
translation: 真是个坏消息，但我仍需要[Root.job_marshal.GetHerHim]。

original: Worrying reports have reached you regarding your [Root.GetMarshalName], [Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName]. It seems [Root.job_marshal.GetSheHe] has been using your soldiers to extort money from the peasantry in [Root.job_marshal.Location.GetName].
translation: 有关[Root.GetMarshalName]在[Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName]的报告称[Root.job_marshal.GetSheHe]一直在让你的士兵勒索[Root.job_marshal.Location.GetName]的农民。

original: I will deal with this later.
A large band of robbers is prowling the countryside.
translation: 一大堆强盗流窜与乡间。
这个区域收到走私者的侵扰。

original: The amount of thieves preying upon the people of this county is enormous.
translation: 大量的盗贼充斥于这个省份。

original: Send your [GetChancellorName] to fabricate claims on landed titles held by local rulers. A highly skilled [GetChancellorName] may even fabricate a claim on a duchy. Only with the Become King ambition is it possible to fabricate a claim on a kingdom.
translation: 让你的[GetChancellorName]去伪造当地领主所拥有的实地头衔的宣称。高技能的[GetChancellorName]有可能伪造公国的宣称。拥有成为国王的野心才有可能伪造王国的宣称。

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to acquire more land and another title, increasing [This.GetHerHis] influence and power in the realm.
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]希望获得更多的土地和另一个头衔来增加[This.GetHerHis]影响力和力量。

original:
My liege!
Loyal servants such as I surely deserve some recognition and rewards from time to time. It is widely known that you hold huge lands and many titles, and are as generous as you are wise. Perhaps you would consider granting this humble servant the [vassal_wanted_title.GetFullName]?

Your vassal, [From.GetTitledName]
translation:
我的领主！
像我这样的忠诚仆人应该时不时的得到一定的认可和奖赏。众所周知，你拥有大量的土地和头衔并且慷慨而睿智。或许你会考虑授予我这个不起眼的仆人[vassal_wanted_title.GetFullName]的头衔？

你的封臣，[From.GetTitledName]

original: This greed does not become you.
I would be happy to grant you this deserved reward, but...
translation: 我很乐意给你应得的奖赏，但是……

original:
My dear vassal,

You are a devoted servant, and I have decided to reward you. Please accept the [vassal_wanted_title.GetFullName] as a token of my love and your loyal service.

Your liege, [From.GetTitledName]
translation:
我亲爱的封臣，

你是一个忠诚的从者，因而我决定奖赏你。请接受[vassal_wanted_title.GetFullName]的头衔作为我对你忠诚的服务的称赞的信物。

你的领主，[From.GetTitledName]

original: My liege holds many titles. As a loyal vassal, surely he could spare me some land...
translation: 我的领主有许多头衔。作为一个忠诚的封臣，他一定会分一点土地给我……

original: As the war rages on, you find that your so-called ally, [ally_not_active_in_war.GetTitledNameWithNick], has been inactive for several years, not taking any offensive action to support you.
translation: 随着战争激烈的进行，你发现你所谓的盟友[ally_not_active_in_war.GetTitledNameWithNick]，已经数年没有什么活跃的表现了。他没有发动任何进攻来支持你。

original: [ally_not_active_in_war.GetSheHeCap] has failed me for the last time.
translation: 自上次以来[ally_not_active_in_war.GetSheHeCap]已经辜负了我的期望。

original: I'll just pretend I didn't notice.

To the [GetFromRootInsult] [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
It pains me greatly to have to tell you that I have noticed the absence of your armies on the field of battle while the war is being fought by others. As I have no need for cowardly and treacherous allies, you may henceforth consider our alliance void.

With the hope of your speedy demise,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
致[GetFromRootInsult][Root.GetTitledFirstName]，
我很痛心地告诉你，我发现当我与其他人战斗的时候，你的军队没有出现在战场上。既然我不需要懦弱且背信弃义的盟友，今后我们就不再是同盟关系了。

希望你早日灭亡的，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: Pirates have been marauding in increasing numbers all along the coast of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] recently. Worse, there is a rumor among the common folk that the pirates are being aided by [pirate_alliance_friction_ally.PrimaryTitle.GetAdjective] agents.
translation: 近来发生在[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]的海岸线上海盗劫掠事件正在不断增加。更糟糕的是一般民众中流传着这些海盗是受到[pirate_alliance_friction_ally.PrimaryTitle.GetAdjective]支持的谣言。

original: I must send a letter to the [pirate_alliance_friction_ally.PrimaryTitle.GetAdjective] [pirate_alliance_friction_ally.GetTitle] and find out if it so.
translation: 我必须写封信去询问[pirate_alliance_friction_ally.PrimaryTitle.GetAdjective][pirate_alliance_friction_ally.GetTitle]有关这件事的真相。

original:
Dear [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

We are experiencing a plague of pirates on our coasts, and there is a rumor that you are supporting them. Can you please put my mind at ease regarding this, for I assume that it is not true. Or is it...?

Regards,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
亲爱的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，

在我的海岸边有一群瘟疫般的海盗，并且有谣言说你在背后支持他们。你能否认这些谣言从而让我安心吗？或者这些谣言是……？

向你问候，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: A strange accusation. [From.GetSheHeCap] is up to something...
translation: 一个奇怪的指控。[From.GetSheHeCap]不过是想……

original:
Dear [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

It grieves me to hear of your troubles. However, I can assure you that I have nothing to do with the pirates that plague your coasts.

Regards,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
亲爱的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，

我已经听说了你所遇到的麻烦。然而，我可以保证我没有支持这些掠夺你海岸的海盗。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: Ah, that puts my mind at rest.

[Root.GetTitledFirstName],
You are a [GetFromRootInsult] and a liar and I will have you know that our pact has been broken through no fault of mine but through your treacherous actions.

May your days be filled with deserved misery,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，
你是个[GetFromRootInsult]和骗子，我告诉你我们之间的协议将不再生效，责任不在我方，这一切都是你奸诈的行为所导致的。

希望你今后生活在苦难之中，
[From.GetTitledName]

original:
[Root.GetTitledFirstName],

I must say I do not approve of the tone in your last letter. Accusing others to try and obscure your own failings in keeping your realm safe only leaves you looking like a [GetFromRootInsult].

I wish you a speedy recovery from your paranoia,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，

我必须表明我不认同你上一封信的说法。你这是通过指责其他人来淡化自己没能维持领地安全的错误。这只会让你看起来像一个[GetFromRootInsult]。

我希望你早日从偏执中醒悟，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: Oh dear... I should try to repair this...
translation: 哦……我应该试着修复我们直接的关系……

original:
Esteemed [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

It distresses me that you perceived my earlier letter as accusing you and questioning your honor, as that was not my intention. Please accept my sincerest apologies for this misunderstanding, and rest assured that I do not suspect you of involvement in piracy.

With hopes of continued friendship,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
尊敬的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，

我对你把我之前的一封信认为是对你的指控和质疑你的名誉感到悲伤。我完全没有这样的意思。对于造成了这样的误解，请接受我最诚挚的道歉。并且请放心，我不认为你与海盗有关系。

希望友谊长存，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: I see now that [From.GetHerHis] intentions were honorable.
I must distance myself from this [GetRootFromInsult] snake.

Dear [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

I accept your apology and look forward to many more years of continued good relations.

With my kindest regards,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
亲爱的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，

我接受你的道歉并且希望我们今后都可以维持友好关系。

带着我最友好的问候，
[From.GetTitledName]

original:
Dear [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

Lamentably, your words of apology do not ring true. I am no fool, and a trust that has been broken cannot be repaired with mere empty words. I cannot maintain a pact under such circumstances.

With scant pleasure,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
亲爱的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，

可悲的是你道歉的话听起来并不真实。我不是一个傻瓜，而且信任一旦被打破就无法再被空虚的言语所修复。在这种情况下，我不会再维持我们之间的协定。

感到悲伤的，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: Very well, if it must be so.
translation: 非常好，如果别无选择的话。

original:
[Root.GetTitledFirstName],

Your aggressive words only serve to strengthen my suspicions regarding your low character and propensity to underhanded dealings. Clearly you planning some dark deed. I demand that you cease at once.

With reluctant regards,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，

你咄咄逼人的话语只会增强我对你低劣的人格和卑鄙的交易的猜疑。显然，你在隐瞒什么，如果不是支持海盗那么也一定是其他我还没发现的阴谋。我要求你立刻停止这种行为

勉强问候你的，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: I should back down before this breaks our relationship.
translation: 我需要在我们关系破裂之前回头。

original: Admit to wrongdoing and send apology.
May the cur choke on [From.GetHerHis] foul tongue!
translation: 希望恶狗咬住[From.GetHerHis]卑劣的舌头！

original:
Dear [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
You are quite right that I have erred in my ways. However, after pondering my faults and considering what a [GetFromRootCompliment] you are, I am now fully committed to seeing you prosper and to preserve our good relationship. I convey to you my sincere and humble apologies.

With the greatest respect and admiration,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
亲爱的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，

你是完全正确的，我弄错了我应该走的路。然而，在琢磨过我犯的错误和考虑到你多么[GetFromRootCompliment]之后，我下定决心要补偿你并且维护我们直接的友好关系。在此我向你表达我的真诚而谦卑的歉意。

满怀尊重和敬佩的，
[From.GetTitledName]

original:
[Root.GetTitledFirstName],

You are the worst kind of scum to frame and then attack in such a vile way those who have been so loyal and steadfast towards you. You are a [GetFromRootInsult] and I would not wish upon anyone the misfortune of making pacts or agreements with you.

Sincerely and disappointedly,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，

你这个最糟糕的败类居然用卑鄙的方式攻击那些忠贞对你的人。你这个[GetFromRootInsult]，我希望不再别人不幸到与你签订协定。

真诚而失望的，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: Select an honorary title to grant to §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!
This will change [Recipient.GetPossPronoun] opinion of you by $OPINION|+$.
translation: 这会增加[Recipient.GetPossPronoun]对你的 $OPINION|+$ 点好感。

original: Appoint a character to be on your council with an honorary title.
translation: 用一个荣誉头衔来任命一个角色进入内阁。

original: You can hand out honorary titles that come with a seat on your council attached to it to your vassals to appease them and prevent them from joining factions against you.
translation: 你可以通过发放一个荣誉头衔和内阁席位来安抚你的封臣并且让他们不会加入反对你的派系。

original: \n\nI would like to give you a seat on my council and therefore offer you the title of §Y[ThirdPartyTitle.GetFullName]§!.
translation: \n\n我希望任命你进入我的内阁，因而提供给你§Y[ThirdPartyTitle.GetFullName]§!的头衔。

original: Fire a character from your council
translation: 把一个角色从你的内阁中开除

original: You can revoke a Councillor title from a character, thus removing them from the Council.
translation: 你可以通过移除一个角色的内阁头衔来把他们从内阁中开出。

original: Select a title to revoke from §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!.
This will change [Recipient.GetPossPronoun] opinion of you by §R$OPINION|+$§!.
translation: 这会使[Recipient.GetPossPronoun]对你的好感改变 §R$OPINION|+$§!。

original: §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§! revoked the title of §Y[ThirdPartyTitle.GetFullName]§! from §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§!, dismissing [Recipient.GetHerHim] from the council
translation: §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§!收回了§Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§!的§Y[ThirdPartyTitle.GetFullName]§!头衔，将[Recipient.GetHerHim]从宫廷中辞退。

original: This character favors a direct approach and prefers leaving advanced manoeuvres to others.
translation: 此人更倾向于与敌人正面作战并将复杂的战术执行留给他人。

original: This character has mastered many languages.
translation: 这个角色掌握了多种语言。

original: I can't stand it any more! Every time we have a visitor from another realm in the court of the [From.GetTitle], [From.GetTitledFirstName] makes a fool of [From.GetHerselfHimself] trying to impress our visitors with [From.GetHerHis] non-existent knowledge of foreign languages.
translation: 我不能再忍受了！每当其他国家的人来拜访[From.GetTitle]时，[From.GetTitledFirstName]都像傻瓜一样，就为了给拜访者留下深刻的印象，用[From.GetHerHis]都不知道的外语。

original: My [Root.GetChancellorName] [language_teacher.GetTitledFirstName] kindly suggests that it would be of benefit to the realm if I studied the languages spoken at foreign courts. [language_teacher.GetSheHeCap] also offers [language_teacher.GetHerselfHimself] to aid me in my studies.
translation: 我的[Root.GetChancellorName][language_teacher.GetTitledFirstName]亲切地建议我应该为了领地的利益去学习外语。[language_teacher.GetSheHeCap]还推荐[language_teacher.GetHerselfHimself]来辅导我学习。

original: If they can't speak [Root.Culture.GetName] they are not important.
translation: 如果他们不会说[Root.Culture.GetName]语，那么他们就无关紧要。

original: Without the support of [language_teacher.GetTitledFirstName], your study sessions seem to be few and far between. You increasingly feel that the challenge is just too great to tackle on your own.
translation: 因为缺乏[language_teacher.GetTitledFirstName]的支持，你的学习基本上没什么进展。你越发感到这个巨大挑战将会压垮你。

original: At least I made an effort.

Your determination and hard work has paid off. Studying with [language_teacher.GetTitledFirstName], you have learned several new languages to a decent level of fluency. This will surely increase your prestige at foreign courts!
translation: 你的选择和努力有了回报。通过向[language_teacher.GetTitledFirstName]学习，你可以流利地说几种新的语言。这会增加你在外国宫廷的威望！

original: I knew I could do it!

Distractions seem to overwhelm you during your studies. The simplest pleasures, and even plain and mundane chores, seem like time better spent than drowning in books all evening. How does one manage to keep focused when everything else is so much more appealing?
translation: 你在学习过程中似乎不够集中。最简单的快乐似乎是花费时间在琐事上而不是整夜读书。当周围所有事物都如此有吸引力时，没有人可以集中精神。

original: If I learn even a few phrases, it will be worth it!
translation: 我只要学到几个词组这一切就是值得的！

original: I guess learning languages is not for everyone.
translation: 我想不是每一个人都适合学习语言。

original: [Root.GetChancellorName] [language_teacher.GetTitledFirstName] has a look of parental disappointment in [language_teacher.GetHerHis] eyes. 'I believe you could have done this well if only you'd put your mind to it. Unfortunately your disinterest is all too apparent in your absence from our meetings. With your permission, I will henceforth focus on more useful work instead of waiting for you, my Liege.'
translation: [Root.GetChancellorName][language_teacher.GetTitledFirstName]，[language_teacher.GetHerHis]眼中满是家长般的失望。「我相信如果你专心的话其实可以做好的。我们会面的时候你一直没能专心在学习上。如果你认为可以的话，我希望可以做一些其他更加有意义的工作而不是把时间浪费在你身上，我的领主。」

original: You will watch your tongue or lose it!
translation: 你要看管好自己的舌头，否则小心失去它！

original: Although I learned less than expected, I thank you for your time.
translation: 尽管我学到的不如预期的多，我还是感谢你。

original: Being a Council Member is a powerful, almost intimidating feeling. The authority, the impact of your decisions across the realm. Inside the circle of trust, so close to this unreal amount of money, one wonders - if some of the gold were to disappear, would anyone even notice?
translation: 成为内阁的一员意味着令人生畏的权力。你的权威，你做出的决定会影响到整个领地。处在被信任的地位上，可以接触到大笔钱财，有人就会想——如果某些钱不见了，会有人注意到么？

original: I can take some, I deserve it.
translation: 我可以拿一些，这是我应得的。

original: Curious, I was as pleased as always when I saw the amount of coin in the coffers this morning. But looking at it now, the amount seems somehow... less. Could it be that someone is stealing from me?
translation: 往常我都会很高兴地看到库房里有如此多硬币。但是现在再看会发现数量减少了……有人偷走了一些？

original: Going through the treasury to account for today's earnings, it seems to me that the coffers seem to contain less than what we started out with today. Either someone is stealing my gold or I must be going mad.
translation: 将今天的收入放入国库时，我发现库房的里财物比今天开始时居然要少。不是有人偷走了我的钱就是我发疯了。

original: When I catch the thieving little rat...
translation: 要是我抓住这只小老鼠……

original: First they take my gold, and then what?
translation: 先是拿走我的钱，再来要拿走什么？

original: As you pass by the treasury, you stumble upon [From.GetTitledFirstName] digging through the coffers. You must have been quiet as [From.GetSheHe] looks very surprised. So this is where the missing gold has gone.
translation: 当你经过国库的时候，你偶然撞见[From.GetTitledFirstName]在向库房里挖地道。你的脚步一定安静，因为[From.GetSheHe]表现得惊慌失措。这就是为什么钱不见的原因。

original: You close the door to your chamber, and as you approach your personal gold coffer you spot someone hiding behind it. A well aimed kick makes [From.GetTitledFirstName] squirm and the sound of what may be broken ribs accompanies [From.GetHerHis] scream of agony.
translation: 你关上了自己房间的门，走向私人金库时发现有人藏在后面。你一脚踢倒[From.GetTitledFirstName]，之后传来了似乎是肋骨断裂的声音，伴随着[From.GetHerHis]痛苦的尖叫。

original: Let [From.GetHerHim] go in exchange for a favor.
translation: 让[From.GetHerHim]离开来交换一个人情。
这个行为是不可接受的。

original: Your [Root.GetTreasurerName] [Root.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName] has also noticed that coins are missing but has concluded that your [From.GetJobTitle], [From.GetTitledFirstName] is the only one that could've stolen it.
translation: 你的[Root.GetTreasurerName][Root.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName]也发现钱财消失但是他断定你的[From.GetJobTitle]，[From.GetTitledFirstName]是唯一有可能盗走钱物的人。

original: Make [From.GetHerHim] swear to never do it again.

I have been caught stealing from the coffers of my Liege. But [From.GetSheHe] has been kind enough to let me go with a warning. [From.GetSheHeCap] insists that I owe [From.GetHerHim] a favor, however.
translation: 我被抓住了在领主金库中行窃。但是[From.GetSheHe]非常善良，警告并且放走了我。[From.GetSheHeCap]坚持让我欠[From.GetHerHim]一个人情作为交换。

original: I was caught stealing from the coffers, but was fortunate enough to be let go with a warning.
translation: 我被抓住了在领主金库中行窃，但是我运气不错只是被警告了下就被释放了。

original: It can't hurt to be a little safer.

Earlier today, my [Root.GetSpymasterName] [safety_measure_spymaster.GetFirstName] presented [safety_measure_spymaster.GetHerHis] plan to catch any sneaky spies at court. [safety_measure_spymaster.GetSheHeCap] has weakened the floorboards in strategic places to make sure a creaking noise is always heard when someone moves around during the night.
translation: 今天早些时候，我的[Root.GetSpymasterName][safety_measure_spymaster.GetFirstName]展示了[safety_measure_spymaster.GetHerHis]计划，关于如何去抓住宫廷里面那些鬼鬼祟祟的间谍。[safety_measure_spymaster.GetSheHeCap]削薄了一些关键地方的地板来确保如果有人在晚上走动的话就会发出吱吱作响的噪音。

original: [safety_measure_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName] is trying out [safety_measure_spymaster.GetHerHis] new plan to get rid of intruders. [safety_measure_spymaster.GetSheHeCap] has been splashing soap on all of the floors to make it more hazardous to move around.
translation: [safety_measure_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName]尝试了[safety_measure_spymaster.GetHerHis]新计划来去除入侵者。[safety_measure_spymaster.GetSheHeCap]在地上放了许多肥皂使得地面变得难以行走。

original: Now if only I could get rid of this terrible headache.
translation: 现在要是我能摆脱这糟糕的头痛就好了。

original: As I entered the gates I was greeted by a large barking dog. My horse was frightened and started to rear. I was just about to draw my blade to slay the beast when I saw my [Root.GetSpymasterName], [safety_measure_spymaster.GetFirstName], come running, shouting: "Bad dog! This is our friend that we're supposed to protect." The dog then stopped barking and rolled around placidly on its back.
translation: 当我进门的时候一只狂叫的大狗在门口欢迎我。我的马收到了惊吓。我差点要拿出刀杀死这头野兽，当我看到我的[Root.GetSpymasterName]，[safety_measure_spymaster.GetFirstName]，跑过来大叫道：「坏狗狗！这是我们应该保护的朋友。」然后这只狗停止了吠叫，平静的转了个身。

original: There's litter and feathers all over the place and when you enter the dining hall you see a huge pelican standing on the table. When [Root.GetSpymasterName] [safety_measure_spymaster.GetFirstName] sees my steaming face [safety_measure_spymaster.GetSheHe] tries to calm me down, introducing me to the new 'Pelican Guard'.
translation: 杂乱的羽毛充斥着这个地方而且当你进入餐厅走廊时你看到一只巨大的鹈鹕停在你的桌子上。当[Root.GetSpymasterName][safety_measure_spymaster.GetFirstName]看到我好像散发着蒸汽的脸时，[safety_measure_spymaster.GetSheHe]试图让我冷静一下，向我介绍新的「鹈鹕护卫」。

original: It bit me! Get rid of it!
It bit my sister! Get rid of it!
translation: 它咬了我的姐妹，快赶走它！

original: [GetSpymasterName] [safety_measure_spymaster.GetFirstName] presents a strange concoction to me. [safety_measure_spymaster.GetSheHeCap] places a peg on my nose and forces me to drink the vile concoction while mumbling something that this will help keep away the forces that lurk in the shadows.
translation: [GetSpymasterName][safety_measure_spymaster.GetFirstName]给我一种奇怪的调和物。[safety_measure_spymaster.GetSheHeCap]固定住了我的鼻子迫使我去喝这恶心的调合物，还含糊地说这能赶走潜藏在阴影中的力量。

original: Eugh! My mouth reeks of garlic.
translation: 啊！我的嘴吧里发出了大蒜般的恶臭。

original: When I walk into the office of my [Root.GetSpymasterName] [safety_measure_spymaster.GetFirstName] I find [safety_measure_spymaster.GetHerHim] carving huge and sharp stakes which [safety_measure_spymaster.GetSheHe] tells me will help bring down any intruder that dares to trespass. The enthusiastic smile on [safety_measure_spymaster.GetFirstName]'s face gives me an eerie feeling.
translation: 当我走进[Root.GetSpymasterName][safety_measure_spymaster.GetFirstName]的办公室时，我发现[safety_measure_spymaster.GetHerHim]在雕刻一个粗大而又尖锐的木桩，[safety_measure_spymaster.GetSheHe]告诉这将帮助我打败任何胆敢冒犯我的人。[safety_measure_spymaster.GetFirstName]脸上浮现出热情的微笑，给我一种毛骨悚然的感觉。
这愚蠢的行为必须停止！

original: [safety_measure_spymaster.GetFirstName] told me [safety_measure_spymaster.GetSheHe] had something exciting to show me. I was left unimpressed when it turned out to be a vial of ordinary water. [safety_measure_spymaster.GetFirstName] then told me that this 'blessed water' can drive away our enemies. The small donation demanded by the supplier had apparently already been taken care of.
translation: [safety_measure_spymaster.GetFirstName]告诉我[safety_measure_spymaster.GetSheHe]有一些令人兴奋的东西要给我看。当发现那只是一小瓶普通的水后我没有特别在意。然后，[safety_measure_spymaster.GetFirstName]告诉我，这个「祝福水」可以驱走我们的敌人。据说供应者要求的小额捐款已经得到了照顾。
这荒唐的行为必须停止！

original: I heard shouting down the corridor and when I came around the corner I see [spiritual.GetTitledFirstName] loudly arguing with my [Root.GetSpymasterName] [safety_measure_spymaster.GetFirstName]. Clearly outraged, [spiritual.GetFirstName] explained to me that [safety_measure_spymaster.GetFirstName] tried to convince [spiritual.GetHerHim] to declare the entire building sacred ground.
translation: 我听到走廊之上传来呼喊声，我还在走廊的转角处看到了[spiritual.GetTitledFirstName]和我的[Root.GetSpymasterName][safety_measure_spymaster.GetFirstName]大声争吵。很显然，他们都被激怒了，[spiritual.GetFirstName]向我解释那是[safety_measure_spymaster.GetFirstName]试图说服[spiritual.GetHerHim]宣称整个建筑都是圣地。

original: [safety_measure_spymaster.GetSheHeCap] was just joking. I hope you understand.
translation: [safety_measure_spymaster.GetSheHeCap]是在开玩笑。我希望你能够明白。

original: Surely, for the correct sum this can be arranged?
translation: 当然，肯定要一笔合适的价钱对吧？

original: [blackmailed_target.GetTitledFirstName] has brought up a grave problem [blackmailed_target.GetSheHe] has with your [GetSpymasterName] [Root.job_spymaster.GetFirstName]. [job_spymaster.GetFirstName] has been using the realm's spies to go snooping about in the personal quarters of [blackmailed_target.GetFirstName] for [job_spymaster.GetHerHis] own personal gain.
translation: [blackmailed_target.GetTitledFirstName]提出了一个严重的问题，[blackmailed_target.GetSheHe]说有关你的[GetSpymasterName][Root.job_spymaster.GetFirstName]。[job_spymaster.GetFirstName]利用王国的间谍去窥探[blackmailed_target.GetFirstName]的私人生活，来谋取[job_spymaster.GetHerHis]私利。

original: Remind [Root.job_spymaster.GetFirstName] to act in the shadows but take no direct actions.
translation: 提醒[Root.job_spymaster.GetFirstName]在暗中行事但是不要直接行动。
似乎暗示着我知道秘密……

original: While walking down the corridor a local peasant runs up to me with panic in his eyes: 'I came here to ask for aid since some of my sheep got killed by wild animals but now I just need to get out of here. I've already paid a dozen fees and been stuck in different rooms for hours in supposed 'queues' but I saw no-one else there. Please help my poor soul!'
translation: 当我走过走廊时一位当地农民带着恐慌的眼神跑来：「求您帮帮我，野兽杀害了我的绵羊，但是我在这儿耗不下去了。我已经交了一大笔费用，又在不同的房间里待了几个小时等待所谓的『队列』，可我一个人也没看见。请帮帮我们这些穷人吧！」

original: Put [Root.job_chancellor.GetFirstName] in prison for [Root.job_chancellor.GetHerHis] bureaucratic scheme.
I'll let [Root.job_chancellor.GetFirstName]'s scheme slip by for now.
This character has had [GetHerHis] home prepared to make it hard to sneak around unnoticed.
translation: 这人已经把[GetHerHis]家变得戒备森严，让人很难在不被发现的前提下悄悄接近。

original: This character has acquired dogs trained to identify strangers sneaking around.
translation: 这位角色养了一条受训后的狗，能够识别周围的陌生人。

original: It has been declared that this character's home is built on holy ground.
translation: 这个角色的家已宣布建造在圣地上。

original: Something I thought I had suppressed and finally subdued has risen inside me. Unchaste thoughts have begun to appear in my mind
translation: 有时候我想我可以忍住并最终克服不断升起的欲望。但不贞的思想还是充斥着我的头脑。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] took offense at your offer of helping [From.GetHerHim] with [From.GetHerHis] language studies.
translation: 你向[From.GetTitledFirstName]提议帮助[From.GetHerHis]语言学习，这使[From.GetHerHim]感觉受到了冒犯。

original: [From.GetHerHisCap] bad manners won't do [From.GetHerHim] any good.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] expressed [From.GetHerHis] gratitude for my offer to tutor [From.GetHerHim] in the languages of foreign courts. [From.GetFirstName] also commended me for the extra effort I put in for the sake of the realm.
translation: 对于我提议教授[From.GetHerHim]外国宫廷的语言，[From.GetTitledFirstName]表达了[From.GetHerHis]谢意。[From.GetFirstName]同时也赞扬了我为王国所作出的其他贡献。

original: Gather some men under the command of §Y[Root.GetFirstName]§! and make them available for anyone to hire. You will gain part of the income that the company brings in when hired by another party.
translation: 召集一些人到§Y[Root.GetFirstName]§!的指挥下，让他们可以被所有人雇佣。如果他们被第三方雇佣走，那么你可以获得一部分的佣金。

original: Is not in a war with §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!
Press §GControl + Left Click§! to show Patricians of $REALM|Y$
translation: 按§GCtrl + 左键§!显示$REALM|Y$的贵人们

original: Press §GControl + Right Click§! to hide Patricians of $REALM|Y$
translation: 按§GCtrl + 右键§!隐藏$REALM|Y$的贵人们

original: Press §GControl + Left Click§! to show Sub-Dynasties of $REALM|Y$
translation: 按§GCtrl + 左键§!显示$REALM|Y$的次级家族

original: Press §GControl + Right Click§! to hide Sub-Dynasties of $REALM|Y$
translation: 按§GCtrl + 右键§!隐藏$REALM|Y$的次级家族

original: Press §GControl + Left Click§! to show Sub-Governments of $REALM|Y$
translation: 按§GCtrl + 左键§!显示$REALM|Y$的次级政体

original: Press §GControl + Right Click§! to hide Sub-Governments of $REALM|Y$
translation: 按§GCtrl + 右键§!隐藏$REALM|Y$的次级政体

original: §RCannot select flank leader for retreating units§!
translation: §R不能任命正在撤退单位中的一路军队的指挥官§!

original: §RThere are no units to split off§!

translation: §R不能分离有陆军搭乘的舰队§!

original: §RCannot split units with only one subunit§!
translation: §R无法分离只有一个次级单位的单位§!

original: Does NOT have a non-aggression pact with $NAME|Y$

translation: 任何有互不侵犯条约的角色

original: Is not in a non-aggression pact with §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!
translation: 不处于和§Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!的互不侵犯条约中

original: §Y[Actor.GetTitledFirstName]§! is not in a non-aggression pact with §Y[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetTitledFirstName]§!
§Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! is not in a non-aggression pact with §Y[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetTitledFirstName]§!
We would get no §YNon-Aggression Pacts§! from the Marriage
translation: 我们将不会从此婚姻中获得§Y互不侵犯条约§!

original: §YWould result in a Non-Aggression Pact with§!
translation: §Y将导致互不侵犯条约，对象是§!

original: The Pact is made with the following ties:
translation: 这个条约因以下关系签订：

original: §RYou are not allowed to join any factions as you have a Non-Aggression Pact with your liege.§!
translation: §R你不允许加入任何派系，因为你与你的领主签订了互不侵犯条约。§!
将导致§Y互不侵犯条约§!结束

original: §YWould result in ending the Non-Aggression Pact with§!
translation: §Y将导致原有的互不侵犯条约结束，对象是§!

original: The Non-Aggression Pact between $FIRST|Y$ and $SECOND|Y$ has been dissolved as they no longer have any marriage ties.
translation: $FIRST|Y$和$SECOND|Y$间的互不侵犯条约已经终止，因为他们之间不再有任何联姻。

original: Income is less than §Y$VAL$%§! of liege.\n
Income is at least §Y$VAL$%§! of liege.\n

translation: 渴望更好的互不侵犯条约
解除盟约的请求被拒绝

original: §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§! refused to Dissolve the Alliance with §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§!.
Is NOT fighting a war together with §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§!.
translation: 没有正在战争中与§Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§!并肩作战。

original: Is NOT a valid romance target of $WHO|Y$
Is a valid romance target of $WHO|Y$
The Alliance and Non-Aggression Pact between $FIRST|Y$ and $SECOND|Y$ has been dissolved as they no longer have any marriage ties.
translation: $FIRST|Y$和$SECOND|Y$的同盟和互不侵犯条约因为不再有任何联姻关系而解散。

original: $ALLY|Y$ has accepted a call to arms from $CALLER|Y$ against $TARGET|Y$. Due to an alliance, $ALLY|Y$ had no other choice.
translation: $ALLY|Y$接受$CALLER|Y$的战争召唤来防御$TARGET|Y$。由于同盟关系，$ALLY|Y$别无选择。

original: $ALLY|Y$ has accepted a call to arms from $CALLER|Y$ against $TARGET|Y$. Due to a blood oath, $ALLY|Y$ had no other choice.
translation: $ALLY|Y$接受$CALLER|Y$的战争召唤来防御$TARGET|Y$。由于血亲的关系，$ALLY|Y$别无选择。

original: Are NOT nomad clans in the same realm
translation: 不是同一国内的游牧部族

original: We have any honorary titles to revoke from §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!
translation: 我们有任意可从§Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!处收回的荣誉头衔

original: Is NOT any liege or vassal of $NAME|Y$
translation: 不是$NAME|Y$的任何领主或封臣

original: $CHAR|Y$ does NOT have a CB against $OTHER|Y$
Gains an Alliance with $TARGET|Y$ for $DURATION|Y$ days.\n
translation: 获得与$TARGET|Y$的同盟持续 $DURATION|Y$ 天。\n

original: Gains an Alliance with $TARGET|Y$ for $DURATION|Y$ months.\n
translation: 获得与$TARGET|Y$的同盟持续 $DURATION|Y$ 月。\n

original: Gains an Alliance with $TARGET|Y$ for $DURATION|Y$ years.\n
translation: 获得与$TARGET|Y$的同盟持续 $DURATION|Y$ 年。\n

original: [target_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName] beams a smile at you while handing over a pouch of gold. [target_treasurer.GetSheHeCap] claims it contains the savings accumulated from hard work and donations from the richer families in your realm.
translation: [target_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName]笑容满面地看着你，交给你一袋金币。[target_treasurer.GetSheHeCap]声称这些钱来自努力工作积累的积蓄和富裕家庭的捐款。

original: We will have to make an example of [target_treasurer.GetHerHim].
Understandable, collecting taxes is tough work.
translation: 可以理解，征收税赋是件棘手的工作。

original: [target_treasurer.GetSheHeCap] will be repaid, but not like this.
translation: [target_treasurer.GetSheHeCap]将会得到报酬，不过不是这种形式。

original: Are you blackmailing me? You'd be happy to keep your job!
translation: 你在威胁我吗？你应该为你有工作感到高兴！

original: [target_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName] approaches you: 'My liege, I have a great idea for a monument. Something to raise our cultural status and make the people notice what a great ruler you are. I would require some gold and your patience, and the work would take a year to complete.'
translation: [target_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName]对你说：「我的领主，我有个很棒的主意，我们可以建造纪念碑。它可以提升我们的文化地位，并让人民认识到你作为统治者的伟大。我想需要一点钱和您的耐心等待，大概花上个一年便可竣工。」
那就去做吧！真令我惊喜！

original: The monument [target_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName] promised is finished. People have gathered to witness the unveiling of the new statue. It is a large portrait of [religious_head.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: [target_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName]许诺的纪念碑竣工了。人们聚在一起见证了新纪念碑的揭幕式。这是一个巨大的[religious_head.GetTitledFirstName]雕像。

original: Surely, this will bring us the God's favor.
translation: 没错，这将给我们带来主的恩赐。

original: The monument [target_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName] promised is finished. The shape of the statue seems a bit off, as it is unveiled some of the crowd seem confused. It is a giant ear with the inscription 'IT LISTENS'.
translation: [target_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName]许诺的纪念碑竣工了。雕像的形状好像不太对，看样子使得有些民众费解。这是一只大耳朵，写着「它聆听着」的碑文。

original: Keep calm everyone! I am a snake!

The monument [target_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName] promised is finished. The statue is unveiled and it's just a bigger version of [target_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName], only slightly better looking than the real [target_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: [target_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName]许诺的纪念碑竣工了。雕像揭幕式上，人们发现这不过是个巨大版的[target_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName]，只是比真正的[target_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName]稍微好看一点。

original: Tear it down! [target_treasurer.GetSheHeCap] will be put in [target_treasurer.GetHerHis] place.

The monument promised by [target_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName] is finished. Some people in the crowd cover their children's eyes as the statue is unveiled. It's a couple in the middle of lovemaking, and not exactly presented in a tasteful way.
translation: [target_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName]许诺的纪念碑竣工了。而当雕像揭幕时，有些人们马上挡住了他们孩子的眼睛。这是一座展示一对情侣正在交欢的雕像，而且它的表现手法并不怎么「雅观」。

original: Children must learn this sooner or later.
translation: 孩子早晚有一天要学会这个。

original: The monument promised by [target_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName] is finished. At the unveiling, the crowd gasps and some even scream. It's something that resembles a throne, with an eyeless horned creature on top. It smells like blood.
translation: [target_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName]许诺的纪念碑竣工了。揭幕式上，人群发出了喘息甚至是尖叫。这是一个类似于宝座的东西，顶部有一个无眼的有角生物。它闻起来像血。

original: I should have seen this coming.
The monument promised by [target_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName] is finished. Upon unveiling, a statue of yourself is revealed and you notice the crowd smiling and giving you a round of applause.
translation: [target_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName]许诺的纪念碑竣工了。揭幕式上展示了一座你自己的雕像，你注意到人群微笑着给了你排山倒海的掌声。

original: [steward.GetTitledFirstName] smiles at you. 'My liege, I have noticed your mind seems to drift off whenever we discuss monetary issues. I believe that to make things interesting, one must be introduced to the subject where it is directly relevant to oneself. Perhaps you would like to join me tomorrow on a full days work?'
translation: [steward.GetTitledFirstName]微笑着和你说道：「我的领主，我注意到每当我们讨论财政问题的时候您就有点昏昏欲睡。我相信如果要让一个人对某件事提起兴趣，就必须让他亲自前去体验一番。或许明天您可以与我一道体验下我一整天的工作？」

original: Hah! You must be joking, I have better things to do.
translation: 哈！你一定是在开玩笑吧，我有更重要的事情去做。

original: [steward.GetTitledFirstName] starts the day off collecting taxes. Some people frown and complain when they give away their earnings. [steward.GetTitledFirstName] calmly explains why taxes are collected and manages to appease the complainers.
translation: [steward.GetTitledFirstName]今天出发去收税。交出收入时一些人皱着眉头抱怨。[steward.GetTitledFirstName]平静地解释收税的目的，成功安抚了这些抱怨的人。
赢得信任就是赢得金钱。

original: Maybe we could squeeze them for some more?
translation: 或许我们可以向他们压榨得更多点？

original: Today, [steward.GetTitledFirstName] brings you to the nearest construction site to evaluate progress. [steward.GetTitledFirstName] notices that the builders are lagging behind the agreed schedule and proceeds to question them. The builders complain about the weather and want more pay to cover the delays. [steward.GetTitledFirstName] looks over your way, awaiting a response.
translation: 今天，[steward.GetTitledFirstName]带你到最近的工地上评估工程进度。[steward.GetTitledFirstName]注意到工程已经落后于原定的进度并前去询问工人们。这些工人们抱怨糟糕的天气，要求多付工钱来赶上进度。[steward.GetTitledFirstName]远远看了你一眼，等待你回应。

original: We will hold our end of the deal when you hold yours.
translation: 我们会处理我们的事，只要你好好完成你的工作。

original: I guess one cannot predict the weather.
translation: 我认为人无法预测天气。

original: Clear the site! You will never work again!
translation: 清理掉这片地方！你们永远不用再来工作了！

original: A friend has come to visit [steward.GetTitledFirstName] this evening. The three of you have a good time discussing your experiences over a fine evening meal. The visitor nods at you, saying: 'How lucky you are, [steward.GetFirstName], to have a liege that understands your work. This cooperation should benefit the both of you.'
translation: 今晚一个朋友来看[steward.GetTitledFirstName]。你们三人享受了丰盛的晚餐经历。访客向你点头说：「你真幸运，[steward.GetFirstName]，能有一个信任你的君主。这让你如鱼得水。」

original: It's been interesting, moreso than many other things I've tried.
translation: 这很有趣，比我试过的大多数事情都更有意思。

original: It wasn't for me, it feels like stealing.
translation: 这不是我该干的，感觉更像是在偷窃。

original: I hated it! We should just kill the peasants and take their money.
translation: 我恨这工作！我们就该直接杀死农民夺走他们的钱。

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] would like a seat on the [This.Liege.GetCouncilName] of [This.GetHerHis] liege.
My hard work will not have gone unnoticed by my liege [target_liege.GetTitledName]. I am worthy of a position on the council and it's time I let [target_liege.GetHerHim] know.
translation: 我的努力工作不会永远被我的领主[target_liege.GetTitledName]忽视。我在内阁里有着应得的位置，现在是时候让[target_liege.GetHerHim]知道了。

original: When [Root.GetRandomGodName] smiles on me, I will get my seat.
translation: 当[Root.GetRandomGodName]向我微笑时，我将得到席位。

original: [aspiring_councillor.GetTitledFirstName] expresses [aspiring_councillor.GetHerHis] wish to have a seat on the Council. [aspiring_councillor.GetHerHisCap] contribution to the realm is significant and [aspiring_councillor.GetHerHis] military strength is not to be ignored, so including [aspiring_councillor.GetHerHim] in the Council may eliminate a potential future threat.
translation: [aspiring_councillor.GetTitledFirstName]表达出[aspiring_councillor.GetHerHis]拥有内阁席位的愿望。[aspiring_councillor.GetHerHisCap]对国家的贡献十分显著，而且[aspiring_councillor.GetHerHis]军事实力不容小觑，所以将[aspiring_councillor.GetHerHim]纳入内阁可以消除一些未来的潜在威胁。

original: I'll see what I can do.
I would not bother you with such petty assignments.
translation: 我不会用如此小气的任命来打扰你。

original: It has been long enough since [target_liege.GetTitledName] promised to make room for me on the council. I could remind [target_liege.GetHerHim] to keep [target_liege.GetHerHis] promise.
translation: [target_liege.GetTitledName]承诺为我在内阁中留位置已经过了很久了。我想我应该提醒[target_liege.GetHerHim]履行[target_liege.GetHerHis]诺言。

original: I'll be on the council in no time!
translation: 我马上就要加入内阁了！

original: [target_liege.GetSheHeCap] probably has a good reason for delaying.

The request of [aspiring_councillor.GetTitledFirstName] for a Council position has been postponed long enough. [aspiring_councillor.GetSheHeCap] thinks it is questionable that [councillor_target.GetTitledFirstName] is allowed on the Council when [aspiring_councillor.GetSheHe] isn't.
translation: [aspiring_councillor.GetTitledFirstName]要求的内阁职位已经延期太久了。[aspiring_councillor.GetSheHeCap]质疑[councillor_target.GetTitledFirstName]都能待在内阁而[aspiring_councillor.GetSheHe]却不行，

original: The request of [aspiring_councillor.GetTitledFirstName] for a Council seat has been postponed long enough. Considering there is an open position, now would be the time to invite [aspiring_councillor.GetHerHim].
translation: [aspiring_councillor.GetTitledFirstName]要求的内阁职位已经延期太久了。考虑到职位有空缺，现在正是邀请[aspiring_councillor.GetHerHim]的时候。

original: Yes, it's time for a change.
translation: 恩，现在是作出改变的时候了。

original: The council is for important people.
translation: 内阁是为重要人物准备的。

original: Make up stories of slander by [councillor_target.GetTitledFirstName].
My request to join the [target_liege.GetCouncilName] of [target_liege.GetTitledName] will be considered.
The answer regarding a position on the [target_liege.GetCouncilName] of [target_liege.GetTitledName] was a definite no.
translation: 关于[target_liege.GetTitledName][target_liege.GetCouncilName]席位的回答是明确的否决。

original: Although I didn't get a council position, I can rest assured that [target_liege.GetTitledName] knows I'm competent. In fact, [target_liege.GetSheHe] said that a council position would be a waste of my precious time.
translation: 尽管我没有在内阁获得位置，但我确信[target_liege.GetTitledName]知道我有能力胜任。事实上，[target_liege.GetSheHe]说进入内阁将会浪费我宝贵的时间。

original: [target_liege.GetTitledName] told me that [councillor_target.GetTitledName] has been slandering me! Of course my wise liege did not believe these lies, but the other councillors are worried, making it hard to give me a council position right now.
translation: [target_liege.GetTitledName]告诉我[councillor_target.GetTitledName]一直在诽谤我！当然我明智的君主不相信这些谎言，但其他内阁成员担心，这使得他们很难马上给我一个内阁的位置。

original: Gain Land for an Unlanded Son
translation: 为没有封地的儿子获取土地

original: You wish to secure some land for a son that is currently not set to inherit any.
translation: 你希望获得一些土地给还没有继承什么的一个儿子。

original: Your vassal, [FromFrom.GetTitledName], is concerned about [FromFrom.GetHerHis] non-inheriting sons. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] asks you to consider them when looking for new vassals.
translation: 你的封臣，[FromFrom.GetTitledName]，现在对[FromFrom.GetHerHis]没有继承权的儿子们感到忧虑。[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap]要求你在寻找新的封臣的时候应注意他们。

original: I could use more good men.
translation: 这让我可以使用更多优秀人才。

original: I can't give out land to anyone who asks.
translation: 不能谁要我的土地我就给谁。

original: I'll write to [target_ruler.GetTitledFirstName]. We could be friends.
translation: 我将写信给[target_ruler.GetTitledFirstName]。我们能够成为朋友。

original: Dear [Root.GetTitledName],\n\nI am glad to hear you are well and that my [target_ruler.GetHusbandWifeOpp]'s visit was a good experience. Unfortunately, in these times pacts are broken left and right and to avoid going back on my word in the future, I would rather not give this kind of guarantee. I hope you understand.
translation: 亲爱的[Root.GetTitledName]，\n\n我很高兴听到你安康，而且我的[target_ruler.GetHusbandWifeOpp]之旅是一次愉快的体验。不幸的是，这个年代到处都有条约被打破，为了将来不会食言，我宁愿不给这种保证。我希望你能理解。

original: A petty noble from [target_ruler_capital.GetName] has spent a week visiting [capital.GetName], constantly bragging about his wealth and estates back home, insulting his local peers and behaving like royalty. Your courtiers are quite sick of him and are asking you to take action.
translation: 一个小贵族来自[target_ruler_capital.GetName]花费了一个星期时间访问[capital.GetName]，不断地吹嘘自己的财富和地产，侮辱当地的贵族，身为小贵族举止却仿佛王室一般。你的群臣都很讨厌他，要求你采取行动。

original: Your courtiers will not like this.
translation: 你的廷臣不会喜欢这个。

original:
Dear [target_ruler.GetTitledName],
We are having some trouble with one of your petty nobles who is visiting [capital.GetName]. His behavior being unacceptable would be quite an understatement, and I will have to take action soon.

Best wishes,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
亲爱的[target_ruler.GetTitledName]，
我们和你的一个小贵族产生了些麻烦，他正在拜访[capital.GetName]。用含蓄的说法他的行为是不可接受的，我将很快对他采取行动。

最美好的祝愿，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: I must show sympathy and explain.
translation: 我必须表示同情和谅解。

original: I will swallow my pride and take responsibility.
translation: 我会吞下我的骄傲，并承担责任。

original:
Dear [Root.GetTitledName],
I'm sorry to hear about your annoying guest. I can assure you that he is not a noble from [target_ruler_capital.GetName]. If this scoundrel still remains in [capital.GetName], I hope you deal with it soon.

 Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
亲爱的[Root.GetTitledName]，
我非常抱歉的听到令您讨厌的访客的事情。我向您保证他不是从[target_ruler_capital.GetName]来的贵族。如果这个恶棍还在[capital.GetName]，我希望你能赶快处理。

真诚的，
[From.GetTitledName]
对付冒名顶替者，然后道歉。

original: I'm no fool, I can tell he's from [target_ruler_capital.GetName].
translation: 我不是傻瓜，我敢说他是从[target_ruler_capital.GetName]来的。

original: Send a letter of apology to [From.GetTitledName]

Dear [Root.GetTitledName],
I feel insulted that the first thing you do is accuse my people of being ill-behaved. Did you ever consider that he may be a fraud? Of course not, you [GetFromRootInsult].

All the best,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
亲爱的[Root.GetTitledName]，
我觉得你第一件侮辱我的事情就是谴责了我的人民行为不端。你有没有考虑过他可能是个骗子？当然没有！你个[GetFromRootInsult]。

祝你一路顺风，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: I will let this go, for now.

translation: 你的盟约处于危险之中。

original:
My sincerest apologies [Root.GetTitledName], I realize that we made assumptions based on lies we were told and I hope this incident will soon be forgotten.

Kind regards,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
我真诚地向[Root.GetTitledName]道歉，我认识到我们所做的假设是建立在我们听到的谎言的基础之上的，我希望我们之间的不快能够很快被忘记。

亲切的问候，
[From.GetTitledName]

original:
[Root.GetTitledName],
I should have known you would try to worm your way out of this matter. Responsibility never came easy to you, you [GetFromRootInsult]. Consider our agreement a thing of the past.

I hope you catch the plague,[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
[Root.GetTitledName]，
我本该知道你会设法摆脱这件事的。责任对你来说从来都不容易，你个[GetFromRootInsult]。考虑我们以前达成的一致，

我希望你染上瘟疫，[From.GetTitledName]

original: This is no friend of ours!

translation: 提议签订互不侵犯条约。

original:
Dear [Root.GetTitledName],
I hope this person has not caused too much trouble. I will inform my people of your customs so that misunderstandings can be avoided when they visit your realm. Thank you for offering a chance to correct this behavior.

Best wishes,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
亲爱的[Root.GetTitledName]，
我希望这个人没有造成太大的麻烦。我会告知我的人民你们的习俗，这样当他们访问你的领地的时候就可以避免误解。感谢你提供了一个机会来纠正这种行为。

最美好的祝福，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: I can ask my Liege, §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!, for a position on the Council. This can only be done once every two years.
translation: 我可以联系我领主§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!，要求在内阁中获得席位。这种事情每两年只能做一次。

original: My humble request to gain land for [chosen_son.GetFirstName] was successful. I no longer have to worry about him.
translation: 我为[chosen_son.GetFirstName]获取土地的谦卑的请求成功了。我不再担心他了。

original: Unfortunately, my Liege could not find it in [From.GetHerHis] heart to give my son any land at this time.
translation: 不幸的是，这次我的领主觉得给我儿子土地不符合[From.GetHerHis]心意。

original: My son [chosen_son.GetFirstName] will now have his own land! My Liege made sure to mention that I should remember this in the future when [From.GetSheHe] requires a favor in return.
translation: 我的儿子[chosen_son.GetFirstName]现在将拥有他自己的土地。我的领主再三提醒我记得在未来[From.GetSheHe]需要的时候回报这个人情。

original: Acquire a county for your son.
translation: 为你的儿子获得了一个省份。

original: Upon the conclusion of a long council meeting you decide to make a toast. Of course, one toast eventually becomes many and time seems to slip away... Later, as you leave the council chamber, you stumble and fall on your face. You can feel the taste of blood in your mouth and dizzyness is setting in.
translation: 一个长时间的内阁会议终于得出了结论，你决定喝一杯庆祝一下。当然，一杯变成了很多杯，时间悄然流逝……后来，当你离开内阁的时候，你脚步蹒跚摔了个嘴啃泥。你嘴里尝到了血的滋味，阵阵晕眩袭来。

original: No need to draw attention to myself right now, I think.
translation: 现在没有必要让自己引起注意，我想。

original: [From.GetTitledName] just left the council meeting but now you can hear a faint call for help. As you go outside you notice [From.GetTitledName] laying flat on [From.GetHerHis] face and all bloodied up. [From.GetSheHeCap] asks you for aid, and to be discreet.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]刚刚离开内阁会议，但你现在却能听见一阵微弱的救命声。你走到外面，发现[From.GetTitledName]平躺在地，[From.GetHerHis]正脸着地全是血污。[From.GetSheHeCap]要求你帮忙，并且保密。

original: Call the others out and mock [From.GetHerHim].
You hear the voice of [From.GetTitledFirstName] just before you pass out. As you wake up the next morning, it feels as if your head is about to explode. But at least you are safe.
translation: 你在晕过去前听到了[From.GetTitledFirstName]的声音。当你在次日早晨醒来的时候，头痛欲裂，不过你最终还是安全了。

original: You notice [From.GetTitledName] standing next to you, [From.GetSheHe] seems to contemplate helping but is not responding to your pleads. Just before you pass out you see [From.GetHerHim] bringing the rest of the councillors out, and they look at you in pity before they help you.
translation: 你注意到[From.GetTitledName]正站在你的旁边，[From.GetSheHe]似乎在考虑是否帮助但是没有理会你的请求。在你即将晕过去前你看到[From.GetHerHim]带着其他的内阁成员出来，幸灾乐祸地看着你。

original: Give the money in exchange for a favor.
[From.GetTitledName] approved your request but [From.GetSheHe] made sure to emphasize that this action is a favor to you and that you should remember it.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]同意了你的请求，但是[From.GetSheHe]再三强调这件事是你欠的人情，你应该记住。

original: A generous offer for a favor.
[From.GetTitledName] offers to help you out with your financial situation. [From.GetSheHeCap] wants to aquire some land in exchange for a very generous sum of money.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]答应帮你摆脱财务困境。[From.GetSheHeCap]想获得一些土地用来抵偿那么一大笔钱。

original: I don't like this kind of deal.
[From.GetTitledName] has shown mercy and will release me, in return for a future favor.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]已经手下留情，并会释放我，以换取未来的人情。

original: My liege has agreed to transfer a vassal to me, but I will have to repay [Root.Liege.GetHerHim] later.
translation: 我的领主已经同意把一个封臣转移给我，但是我将来不得不回报[Root.Liege.GetHerHim]。

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] can have a vassal, for a favor.
translation: [From.GetSheHeCap]能够欠下人情获得一个封臣。

original: Your vassal [target_vassal.GetTitledName] is arguing with [target_vassal.GetHerHis] [target_vassal.GetHusbandWifeOpp]. [target_vassal.GetSheHeCapOpp] seems quite upset and they are almost screaming at each other. They don't even notice that you are watching them.
translation: 你的封臣[target_vassal.GetTitledName]正在与[target_vassal.GetHerHis][target_vassal.GetHusbandWifeOpp]争吵。[target_vassal.GetSheHeCapOpp]似乎非常沮丧，他们几乎向彼此尖叫。他们没有注意到你正在观察他们。

original: As you approach the couple, you look at them both and explain that [target_vassal.GetFirstName] must have been under a lot of stress lately with all the responsibilities the council put on [target_vassal.GetHerHim]. Now there will be less to do and [target_vassal.GetSheHe] will have time to show [target_vassal.GetHerHis] [target_vassal.GetHusbandWifeOpp] some appreciation.
translation: 当你走近这对夫妇，你看向他们，然后解释[target_vassal.GetFirstName]最近一定有很多的压力，这来自于内阁施加给[target_vassal.GetHerHim]的全部职责。现在那里没有什么可做的，[target_vassal.GetSheHe]将有时间表示对[target_vassal.GetHerHis][target_vassal.GetHusbandWifeOpp]的感谢。

original: Me and my [Root.GetHusbandWifeOpp] were arguing violently about insignificant matters but [From.GetTitledName] came to my rescue and my marriage may be saved because of that.
translation: 我和我的[Root.GetHusbandWifeOpp]因为不重要的事情而激烈争吵，[From.GetTitledName]给我解围，我的婚姻也因此得到拯救。

original: Debug:\n§GCtrl-click to Play as this character\nAlt-click to Kill this character§!
translation: 调试：\n§G按住 Ctrl 点击以这个角色进行游戏\n按住 Alt 点击杀掉这个角色§!

original: This army is in friendly territory and will be reinforced with $REINFORCE|+0$ troops every month from its home settlement.
translation: 这支陆军现在位于友好领土之内，将从老家获得每月 $REINFORCE|+0$ 增援。

original: If in friendly territory, this army would be reinforced with $REINFORCE|+0$ troops every month. Closest friendly territory is $FRIENDLY|Y$ from its home settlement.
translation: 如果在友好领土之内，这支陆军将获得每月 $REINFORCE|+0$ 增援。与其老家最近的友好领土是$FRIENDLY|Y$。

original: Make your relation even stronger by forming a proper Alliance.
translation: 通过建立一个合适的同盟使得你们的关系更加牢固。

original: §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§W declined the proposal for an alliance with §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§W
§Y[Actor.GetBestName]§W wants to form an Alliance with us.
\n\nWe should make our relation even stronger by forming a proper Alliance.
translation: \n\n建立一个合适的同盟使得我们的关系更加牢固。

original: Ask $WHO|Y$ if they want to form a proper Alliance.
translation: 询问$WHO|Y$是否愿意建立一个合适的同盟。

original: Is a close relative OR has a non-aggression pact with $NAME|Y$
translation: 与$NAME|Y$是近亲或有互不侵犯条约。

original: You'll be able to change position again in $NUM|Y$ months.
translation: 你将能在 $NUM|Y$ 月后再次改变内阁席位。

original: It's possible to change council position by clicking the positions in the top of the interface.
translation: 通过点击界面顶部的位置可以改变内阁席位。

original: §GClick to change your position on the council to $POSITION|Y$§!
translation: §G通过点击来改变你的内阁席位到$POSITION|Y$§!

original: After you've changed position, you'll not be able to change again for another $NUM|Y$ months.\nDo you want change your position on the Council to $POSITION|Y$?
translation: 在你改变席位后，你将在 $NUM|Y$ 个月内无法再次改变。\n你确定改变内阁席位为$POSITION|Y$？

original: Give a gift of gold to return a Favor or to receive a Favor later on.
translation: 赠送黄金用来还人情或者获得未来的人情。

original: Call in the Favor that [Recipient.GetBestName] owes you.
Call in the Favor that [Recipient.GetBestName] owes you.
By calling in a Favor [Recipient.GetBestName] will vote as you do on the council for $MONTHS$ months.
translation: 通过要求兑现人情，[Recipient.GetBestName]将在 $MONTHS$ 月内投票支持你在内阁的行动。

original: $WHO|Y$ owes you a favor that you can call in.
translation: $WHO|Y$欠你一个人情，你可以要求兑现。

original:
$INTERACTION$
The Council voted against it:
$COUNCIL_RESULT$
$CHARACTER_RESULT|Y$ voted against it.

$INTERACTION$
The Council abstained from voting:
$COUNCIL_RESULT$
$CHARACTER_RESULT|Y$ voted against it.
$CHARACTER|Y$ did not owe an activated favor
$CHARACTER|Y$ did not hold an activated favor
Is among the top $VALUE|Y$ vassals in terms of powerbase.
translation: 根据实力属于 $VALUE|Y$ 大顶级封臣

original: Is the vassal with the strongest powerbase.
Is not among the top $VALUE|Y$ vassals in terms of powerbase.
translation: 根据实力不属于 $VALUE|Y$ 大顶级封臣

original: Is not the vassal with the strongest powerbase.
Not allowed to loot due to non-aggression pact with $CHAR|Y$
translation: 因为有与$CHAR|Y$的互不侵犯条约所以不允许劫掠。

original: §YIs considered a powerful vassal in your realm.§!
translation: §Y被认为是你领内一个强大的封臣。§!

original: This will change [Recipient.GetPossPronoun] opinion of you by $OPINION|+$.
This will change [Recipient.GetPossPronoun] opinion of you by $OPINION|+$ ($TITLE_OPINION|+$ from losing the title and $REVOKE_OPINION|+$ from making [Recipient.GetObjectPronoun] upset).
translation: 这将改变[Recipient.GetPossPronoun]对你的好感 $OPINION|+$。（$TITLE_OPINION|+$ 来自失去头衔，$REVOKE_OPINION|+$ 来自使[Recipient.GetObjectPronoun]不满。）

original: Has actively participated during the past $DAYS$.
translation: 在过去 $DAYS$ 天曾经积极参与战争。

original: Has not actively participated in the war during the past $DAYS$ days.
translation: 在过去 $DAYS$ 天不曾积极参与战争。

original: My war is costing a lot
I have better use for the favor
translation: 我对人情有更好的用途

original: I graciously accept your gift and will remember your good intentions in the future.
translation: 我欣然接受你的礼物，将来会记得你的好意。

original: You must understand that you cannot simply buy my loyalty like this. I refuse your gift.
translation: 你必须明白你不能这么轻易地买到我的忠诚。我拒绝你的礼物。

original:
The council votes §Gyes§!.
$FOR|Y$ voters were for and $AGAINST|Y$ were against.
You have $TOTAL|Y$ seats in your council and a majority of those must be voting yes, with the liege breaking ties.
Empty seats are considered to be voting no.
translation:
内阁投票§G通过§!。
$FOR|Y$ 投票者赞成，$AGAINST|Y$ 投票者反对。
你的内阁共有 $TOTAL|Y$ 个职位，其中多数必须投票通过，而领主可以打破平票。
空缺的职位会被视为投票反对。

original:
The council votes §Rno§!.
$FOR|Y$ voters were for and $AGAINST|Y$ were against.
You have $TOTAL|Y$ seats in your council and a majority of those must be voting yes, with the liege breaking ties.
Empty seats are considered to be voting no.
Going against the council will make them discontent, allowing them to enter factions. It will also be considered tyrannical and lower all your subjects opinions of you by $OPINION|R$.
translation:
内阁投票§R否决§!。
$FOR|Y$ 投票者赞成，$AGAINST|Y$ 投票者反对。
你的内阁共有 $TOTAL|Y$ 个席位，其中多数必须投票通过，而领主可以打破平票。
空缺的职位会被视为投票反对。
违背内阁会使他们不满，并将允许他们加入派系。这也会被视为暴君行径，并降低所有你所有臣民对你的好感 $OPINION|R$。

original: This voter has no particular opinion in the matter and has been swayed by the diplomacy rating of other voters.
translation: 这名投票人在这个问题上没有特定的观点且会受到其他投票人的外交能力影响。

original: Request support from [Recipient.GetBestName] in exchange for a Favor.
If §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§! accepts your request [Recipient.GetSubjectPronoun] will vote as you do on the Council for $MONTHS|Y$ months and you will owe [Recipient.GetObjectPronoun] a Favor.
translation: 如果§Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§!接受你的请求，[Recipient.GetSubjectPronoun]将 $MONTHS|Y$ 个月内在内阁投票中与你一致，且你将欠[Recipient.GetObjectPronoun]一个人情。

original: \n\nPlease support me by voting with me in the council. If you agree to do this for me, I will henceforth owe you a Favor.
translation: \n\n请支持我在内阁投票中与我一致。如果你同意为我这么做，我从此欠你一个人情。

original: I will support you in the council.
I am sorry, but I just cannot support you in the council.
translation: 对不起，我不能在内阁中支持你。

original: [target_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName] reminds you of all the good work [target_treasurer.GetSheHe] has done lately. [target_treasurer.GetSheHeCap] thinks that with a fair compensation from [target_treasurer.GetHerHis] own pocket the [requested_province.GetFullName] is only a modest request.
translation: [target_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName]提醒你[target_treasurer.GetSheHe]近来所做的所有贡献。[target_treasurer.GetSheHeCap]认为考虑到[target_treasurer.GetHerHis]私人财富为此付出的大笔补贴，只要求[requested_province.GetFullName]作为奖励是很正常的。
